title: New & MPFree: Soosh – Farewell
body:
It’s been 48 hours and I’m running on a very limited amount of sleep, so I’ll keep this short.

About 2 hours ago [**Soosh**](http://www.facebook.com/pages/Soosh/210174082345883) posted a new tune on his **[Soundcloud](http://soundcloud.com/soosh)** entitled, **_Farewell_**. It’s one of the most beautiful and compelling pieces of music I’ve heard in a while. Now i can sleep.

Stream and download the track below.

 [Farewell](http://soundcloud.com/soosh/farewell) by [Soosh](http://soundcloud.com/soosh)
